TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Taimali, title = Taimali, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taimali} }

S.FORM: Taimali Taimali gu icuwa i Taitung. ala atjunangn mapuljat 102.29 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 4.53 km², ma'linaule atjunang 57.38 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 7,128 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 2,979 a daceneqlan, Puyuma, Amis (67%) a maqcuwa caucau. tjauvali aicu a tjauvali(penaywanan: Tjavualji；'inamizukan: Tjavualji；kai na taiwan: Thài-mâ-lí-hiong；kai na客家語四縣腔:tai maˇ liˊ hiongˊ)i pasakacedas a navalj tua taitu tua taiwan, nakidekes tua seputuma,valangaw, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a jinfeng, a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i daren, a i pasanavalj izua a sedawu. Nakitangez tua gadu i vecekadan tua taiwan, izuazua a lizuk namaka ljeveljevek, izuazua a liyaw a gadu, a tjaljavavavavavan a gadu izua a kuzulj katu sepatj a iday a pasavavaw.(2000公尺), azua a kina'adavan namasanmaculjuculju a kinavaliyan imaza a caucau i tjauvali, izua tjuruvu(2/3) a pairang kata kasalisiyan (1/3), izua a amizuku, drekay, paiwan, ruqivu tiamadju a sipenaywanan ata kai na amizuku. nu 2000 a cavilj, izua a sikivangavangan a "千禧迎曙光活動", pungadan tua tjauvali, qaw izua a "日升之鄉"a ngadan auta. paljavak tua atjunang matja 9 qinaljan i Taimali. matja 13 qinaljan imaza, Lupakatj , Tjavualji , Kiring , Tjatjigel , Anasolay , Davugele , Takidis , Padrangigrang , Calavi , Kanadun Sasaljak , Lalauran , Cilalongay . likisi kasicuayanga a ngadan na aicu a tjavuali a "tjavualji" ,mavan a "pazarezar a qadaw tua culj a katjunangan" a siniaya i paiwan a kai. izuazua a ngadan a "大貓貍,大麻里" a vinecikan na ciukuk. nu 1920 a cavilj, papungadan taicu a guan a "太麻里", qaw inumalj nua sihu a ngadan a "太麻里庄", se台東廳台東郡. nu pakavilji a masanmusalj a makaqeci sekacawan, inumalj a ngadan a "台東縣太麻里鄉" patjetucu. zuku izuazua a tjuruvu a zuku i tjavuali, izua a paiwan zuku , amizuku , drekai . izuazua a tjuruvu a zuku i tjavuali, izua a paiwanzuku,amizuku,drekai,外省人,閩南人kata客家人. aicu a paiwanzuku imaza, mavan a paqaroqaro ,a sepaqaluqalu. avan a 大王部落a kava,kakudanan niamadju, nasetevelj ta puyuma kata amizuku. caucau i tjavuali a caucau, tjuruvu(2/3) a pairang, izau zuma a kaimaza a caucau. a kinavadavadayan nua kaimaza a caucau, savid ta kata德其里.qaw, aicu a paiwan zuku, kinavadavaday i kata多良村.aicu a amizuku, kinavadavaday i荒野,舊香蘭kata德其里. kivangavangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimuluq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan

Taimali Taimali go icowa i Taitong. ala atjonangn mapoljat 102.29 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 4.53 km², ma'linaole atjonang 57.38 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 7,128 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 2,979 a daceneqlan, Poyoma, Amis (67%) a maqcowa caocao. tjaovali aico a tjaovali(penaywanan: Tjavoalji；'inamizokan: Tjavoalji；kai na taiwan: Thài-mâ-lí-hiong；kai na客家語四縣腔:tai maˇ liˊ hiongˊ)i pasakacedas a navalj toa taito toa taiwan, nakidekes toa sepotoma,valangaw, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a jinfeng, a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i daren, a i pasanavalj izoa a sedawo. Nakitangez toa gado i vecekadan toa taiwan, izoazoa a lizok namaka ljeveljevek, izoazoa a liyaw a gado, a tjaljavavavavavan a gado izoa a kozolj kato sepatj a iday a pasavavaw.(2000公尺), azoa a kina'adavan namasanmacoljocoljo a kinavaliyan imaza a caocao i tjaovali, izoa tjorovo(2/3) a pairang kata kasalisiyan (1/3), izoa a amizoko, drekay, paiwan, roqivo tiamadjo a sipenaywanan ata kai na amizoko. no 2000 a cavilj, izoa a sikivangavangan a "千禧迎曙光活動", pongadan toa tjaovali, qaw izoa a "日升之鄉"a ngadan aota. paljavak toa atjonang matja 9 qinaljan i Taimali. matja 13 qinaljan imaza, Lopakatj , Tjavoalji , Kiring , Tjatjigel , Anasolay , Davogele , Takidis , Padrangigrang , Calavi , Kanadon Sasaljak , Lalaoran , Cilalongay . likisi kasicoayanga a ngadan na aico a tjavoali a "tjavoalji" ,mavan a "pazarezar a qadaw toa colj a katjonangan" a siniaya i paiwan a kai. izoazoa a ngadan a "大貓貍,大麻里" a vinecikan na ciokok. no 1920 a cavilj, papongadan taico a goan a "太麻里", qaw inomalj noa siho a ngadan a "太麻里庄", se台東廳台東郡. no pakavilji a masanmosalj a makaqeci sekacawan, inomalj a ngadan a "台東縣太麻里鄉" patjetoco. zoko izoazoa a tjorovo a zoko i tjavoali, izoa a paiwan zoko , amizoko , drekai . izoazoa a tjorovo a zoko i tjavoali, izoa a paiwanzoko,amizoko,drekai,外省人,閩南人kata客家人. aico a paiwanzoko imaza, mavan a paqaroqaro ,a sepaqaloqalo. avan a 大王部落a kava,kakodanan niamadjo, nasetevelj ta poyoma kata amizoko. caocao i tjavoali a caocao, tjorovo(2/3) a pairang, izao zoma a kaimaza a caocao. a kinavadavadayan noa kaimaza a caocao, savid ta kata德其里.qaw, aico a paiwan zoko, kinavadavaday i kata多良村.aico a amizoko, kinavadavaday i荒野,舊香蘭kata德其里. kivangavangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan sikamasansivalj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimoloq saka ita a palidring a djalan na taiwan
